name: Climbing Over It with Fizzd
description:
Rock climbing game made for fizzd's birthday!

Climb on same-colored rocks to progress!

Credits:

  • Morphious86: Game Design & Programming
  • Giacomo Preciado: Programming
  • Winston Lee: Art

(psst, download the game to play with a more ergonomic control scheme)
